name: Maze Runner (itch) (CodyHadden)
description:
This project was created with the prompt "Keep Your Distance" The player must avoid platforms by either jumping over or sliding under to avoid death and restarting the game, whilst the player is running they are also being chased by an entity that will restart the game & timer if it reaches the player.

Group project created by
Nikhil - https://nikhil-naidu.itch.io/
Cody - https://codyhadden.itch.io/

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W - Forward
A - Left
S - Back
D - Right
Space - Jump
Control - Crouch / SlideMouse - Look
Escape - Close Game
M - Main Menu

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
